game.shortDescription: A vividly animated action roguelite focused on boss hunting. Unleash an array of diverse weapons and powerups to combat the corruption of the Void.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A vividly animated action roguelite focused on boss hunting. Unleash an array of diverse weapons and powerups to combat the corruption of the Void.

reviewHighlights.text: The marketing team didn't do a good job on their part. This game should be more popular than it is. Gameplay is satisfying and difficulty is just fair...
The one and only reason I was born is to play this hidden gorgeous game. Waiting for Voidigo 2 after semiwork is done with R.E.P.O.
